full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Open Construction Source List

#### Tender Title

We hereby invite contractors and suppliers to apply to be placed on an Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence at Garrison Valcartier, Quebec, and its satellite sites.

#### Tender Details

- **Tender Title**: Open Construction Source List for Garrison Valcartier
- **Solicitation Number**: QU22SLVR
- **Publication Date**: 2022-12-12
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2026-03-31T16:00:00
- **Region**: Garrison Valcartier, Quebec

#### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for the OCSL, contractors and suppliers must demonstrate the ability to perform various types of construction services, including:

- Commercial building construction
- Residential building construction
- Industrial construction
- Institutional construction
- Civil construction

#### Application Process

Interested contractors and suppliers may request to be placed on the OCSL at any time. To apply, submit a request through this MERX posting and indicate your preferred official language (English or French). The language selected will be the sole language used for all future communications and tender documents.

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents will be available electronically through MERX. Contractors and suppliers are required to have an active MERX account to submit electronic bids.

#### Important Notes

- The OCSL will be used for procurements covered by trade agreements to which Canada is a party.
- The tender process may include site meetings and other evaluation criteria.
- Contractors and suppliers are advised that contracts awarded by Defence Canada include measurable performance standards and requirements.
- Contracts and tenders may contain organization and personnel security requirements.

#### Contact Information

For inquiries regarding this tender or to request to be removed from the OCSL, please contact:

- Defence Construction Canada
- Jacob Lachapelle
- Jacob.Lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
- Phone: 343-550-4560
- MERX Website: www.merx.com

Note: All prices and currency used throughout this post are in Canadian dollars. Please refer to the applicable government regulations and laws for more information.
